description: Name of the checklist template used for vehicle, equipment, or safety inspections and maintenance tasks.
Free‑text summary describing the purpose, scope, or instructions for the checklist template.
User ID that created the checklist template record.
Timestamp when the checklist template record was created; time zone likely UTC—confirm with SME.
User ID that last modified the checklist template record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the checklist template; time zone likely UTC—confirm with SME.
